content.question: The function <math alttext="g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is defined for all positive <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="0 is less than g of x, which is less than x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>. topic.text: 1.15: Connecting Limits at Infinity and Horizontal Asymptotes
